thread.section_title: Ink Station Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ink Station | inkstation.com.au | 9 of 1312
thread.title: EJ

author: EJ
title: EJ
text: Why is it that other ink cartridge providers cannot offer the same reliable, prompt, excellent service? Big name vendors are double the price AND they are trying to make it harder to use 'compatible' cartridges. The only constructive criticism I would make is for them to ensure that all Ink Station cartridges are filled to the top. Which means when filling them they should ensure that the interior sponge gets a big drink as well before sealing. I only experienced this once so that is why all up I vote 5 stars. Keep up the great work. I hope your working conditions are better than that of Amazon's.
